headline: James Carville: Republicans Are Just Plain Weird
author: Susie Madrak
sentences: "The thing that Democrats need to do is start pointing out how weird and strange the Republicans have become and talk more about that and less about what Biden hasn't done for them.
"So that's what you call the weirdo party, from Tucker Carlson's obsession with the tanning for testosterone to rooting for Putin, which we have documented is a big problem.
"He wants people that will be compliant to his world view, which is tax cuts for the richest people in the world and tax poor people, which isn't a very smart idea.
